metadata.author: William Boericke
metadata.title: Pocket Manual of Homoeopathic Materia Medica
metadata.description: Boericke's Materia Medica is a classic homeopathic text known for its concise and practical clinical information.

keynotes: Sudden, violent onset of complaints with fever.
Fear of death, predicts the time.
Complaints from exposure to dry, cold wind.
Hot, red, flushed face with dilated pupils.
Throbbing pains, especially in the head.
Delirium with visions and desire to escape.
